title: Book store sales in the U.S. 1992 to 2018
summary: Overall Sales in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 1994 to 1999.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1994 and 1995.
The highest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 14.17 was reached at Year 1999
Minimum Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 10.11 was reached at Year 1994
